name: Creating an Inviting UI/UX for Web3 Product
description: We will go through tools such as Figma, TailwindCSS, antD etc. to help you creating an inviting UI/UX for your hackathon product.

speakers.name: Lucy Qiu
speakers.bio: Full-stack engineer with previous experience at Goldman Sachs and Manta Network. Winner of multiple hackathon prizes. Background in computer science and UI/UX design. Expertise in community building.
